title: Measurement of circumgalactic extinction in the Kilo-Degree Survey's Data Release 4
summary: This paper investigates the amount and distribution of dust in galactic halos by measuring shifts in observed magnitudes of background galaxies using multi-band magnitude shifts in the Kilo-Degree Survey (KiDS) Data Release 4.
usefulness_reason: The paper uses "Kilo-Degree Survey" data, which is relevant to "Survey data". However, it does not explicitly mention "Point Process" or "Contextual dataset".
